Posts.EditableText:

  I know some where, just not where (Either here or the wiki...) that states some places to download from freeware sites or open property license sites or something that you can use legally in your games.  I think Youtube and Vemo (I think that was the name.) was two, but what about for pictures and sounds?  I forget the name or link and did a search, but came up with 16 pages to look through.  Also are there more that you guys know about that you had not mentioned?  I know I can search for sounds and pics normally, but you gave specific sites with some kind of free use policy or something.

Posts.EditableText: I'm afraid I can't be too much help here, as I tend to just foley my own sound effects if I need them. The only thing I can recommend is googling something like "free sound effects" or "public domain sound effects" or "royalty-free sound effect", although that last one won't guarantee the sound effects themselves are free, just that you don't need to pay royalties if you use them in something commercial.
